prompt:
You are an AI assistant that reads README files. Provide a concise TL;DR summary of the following README (2–3 lines):

# README Improver

![Logo](assets/logo.png)

[![Build Status](https://img.shields.io/github/actions/workflow/status/habib13352/ai-readme-improver/ci.yml)](https://github.com/habib13352/ai-readme-improver/actions) [![License](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-blue.svg)](LICENSE)

## Table of Contents
<!-- TOC -->

## Demo
![Demo](assets/demo.gif)

## Installation
```bash
pip install ai-readme-improver
```

## Usage
```bash
ai-readme-improver --help
```

## Contributing
See [CONTRIBUTING.md](CONTRIBUTING.md).

## Contact

response:
TL;DR

AI README Improver is a tool for enhancing README files. Install with `pip install ai-readme-improver` and use `ai-readme-improver --help` for usage. Contributions welcome, licensed under MIT, maintained by Hamza Ali Habib. Contact via email at hamzahabib10@gmail.com.
